about_the_game:
Small Flower Embroidered cheongsam costume bag (with 29999 soul coins attached) DLC, including small flower character costume "embroidered cheongsam" permanent unlock, with the DLC gift of 29999 soul coins.
"Jinpao is elegant and charming, and the spring wind blows the willow to show its enchantment." The cheongsam is a moonwhite spring crepe. It is light and soft. The skirt body is embroidered with red and green two-color thread with several mandalas. The clear shadows are sparse and oblique, like the moonlight, caged in the body of the spiritual detective, full of charm.
Style:
Top: Embroidered Cheongsam
Pants: Embroidered Cheongsam
Shoes: embroidered cloth shoes
Other:
